input.product_vision:
product_name: Energy Trading Simulation Lab
product_summary: A highly realistic and interactive simulation platform designed to
  provide a safe, immersive environment for users to learn, practice, and master the
  complexities of energy market trading. It aims to develop advanced trading skills,
  foster strategic decision-making, and deepen understanding of global energy market
  dynamics without real-world financial risk.
target_users:
- Aspiring energy traders
- Experienced energy traders seeking to refine skills
- Students and educators in energy economics and finance
- Financial analysts specializing in energy markets
value_proposition:
- Develop advanced energy trading skills in a risk-free environment
- Gain practical experience with realistic market scenarios and instruments
- Understand complex energy market dynamics and price drivers
- Accelerate learning and professional development for energy market participants
key_capabilities:
- Realistic simulation of various energy commodities (e.g., crude oil, natural gas,
  electricity)
- Dynamic market conditions and event injection (e.g., geopolitical events, supply
  disruptions)
- Interactive trading interface with order types, positions, and portfolio management
- Performance analytics and feedback on trading strategies
- Customizable simulation scenarios and difficulty levels
- Educational modules on energy market fundamentals and trading strategies
non_goals:
- Facilitate real-money trading or direct market integration
- Provide financial advice or investment recommendations
- Serve as a general-purpose financial analysis platform (beyond simulation context)
- Focus on non-energy commodity trading
success_metrics:
- User engagement (e.g., simulation sessions completed, time spent)
- Demonstrable improvement in trading performance within the simulation
- User satisfaction with realism and educational value
- Adoption rate by educational institutions and corporate training programs

  priority: Medium

  priority: High

  priority: High

title: FlotaTrack – Sistema de Gestión y Mantenimiento
input.product_vision:
product_name: FlotaTrack
product_summary: FlotaTrack es un sistema integral diseñado para la gestión de flotas
  de vehículos, integrando telemetría en tiempo real y mantenimiento preventivo. Permite
  a las empresas monitorear ubicación, consumo de combustible, kilometraje y estado
  mecánico de cada vehículo mediante datos recogidos por sensores GPS y otros dispositivos
  conectados. Además, el sistema automatiza la programación de citas de mantenimiento
  basadas en horarios o distancias recorridas, notificando a los usuarios cuando es
  necesario realizar intervenciones preventivas para minimizar fallos y costos operativos.
target_users:
- Empresas de gestión de flotas
- Operadores logísticos
- Gerentes de flota
- Conductores (como receptores de notificaciones)
value_proposition:
- Minimizar fallos y costos operativos de la flota.
- Mejorar la eficiencia y la toma de decisiones mediante el monitoreo en tiempo real.
- Automatizar y optimizar la programación del mantenimiento preventivo.
- Proporcionar visibilidad completa del estado y rendimiento de los vehículos.
key_capabilities:
- Ingesta y visualización de datos de telemetría en tiempo real (ubicación, consumo,
  kilometraje).
- Configuración y gestión de alertas automáticas para mantenimiento preventivo.
- Gestión de inventario y registro detallado de vehículos con estado mecánico.
- Generación de reportes detallados sobre consumo y costos operativos.
- Sistema de notificaciones para usuarios sobre tareas e incidentes.
- Escalabilidad para manejar grandes volúmenes de datos y dispositivos.
- Interoperabilidad con sistemas de gestión empresarial existentes.
- Seguridad y privacidad de los datos de la flota y usuarios.
non_goals:
- Desarrollo o venta de hardware de sensores propietarios.

input.product_vision:
product_name: EventPulse
product_summary: EventPulse is a Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) platform designed to
  streamline event management, from catalog creation to attendee registration and
  real-time check-in. It provides a mobile-ready user interface and proactive notifications
  to enhance both organizer and attendee experiences.
target_users:
- Event Organizers/Administrators
- Event Attendees
value_proposition:
- Simplify event planning and execution for organizers.
- Provide a seamless registration and check-in experience for attendees.
- Improve communication and engagement with attendees through timely notifications.
key_capabilities:
- Event creation, editing, and cancellation with audit trails.
- Attendee registration for events (email, name).
- Real-time attendee check-in with badge confirmation.
- Proactive notifications for schedule changes (push/email).
- Responsive UI across desktop, tablet, and mobile.
- Integration with existing CRM for attendee master data.
non_goals:
- Advanced ticketing sales or complex monetization features.
- Comprehensive CRM functionality beyond attendee master data integration.
- Support for a wide range of languages beyond English and Spanish for initial launch.
- Budget exceeding $500k for initial development.
- Complex analytical dashboards beyond core event metrics.
success_metrics:
- 99.9% uptime during event days.
- Successful attendee registration rates.
- Smooth real-time check-in process.
- User satisfaction with mobile UI and notifications.
- Successful integration with CRM.
